VII.ii.1.A.4.b
.
Notification Prior to Age 13
The system-generated notice automatically sent to the payee/parent of a child, to or for whom VA is paying DIC, prior to the child’s 13th birthday, includes as an attachment
VA Pamphlet 22-73-3
,
Dependents’ Educational Assistance Program (DEA)
.
Note
:  The notice
advises the payee/parent of the educational assistance available, and
stresses the importance of planning a high school curriculum to prepare the child for a suitable program of higher education or other post-high school training.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Benefit Entitlement for School Children
